sense1_example: May nahiling akong nagdadalagan na ikos.||I saw a cat running.
sense2_example: Matibay syang magpadalagan nin negosyo.||She runs a business.

sense1_example: Matibay syang magpadalagan nin negosyo.||She is good at running business.

sense1_meaning: a building for people to live in
sense1_example: Ini an samuyang harong.||This is our house.
sense2_example: Harong ko ini.||This is my home.

sense1_meaning: to put food into the mouth and swallow
sense1_example: Nagkakan kami subagong aga.||We ate this morning.
Dakula an harong.||The house is big.
